titles: The martyr'd souldier as it was sundry times acted with a generall applause at the Private House in Drury lane, and at other publicke theaters. By the Queenes Majesties servants. The author H. Shirley Gent.
author: Shirley, Henry, d. 1627.
Kirke, John, d. 1643.
publisher: Printed by I. Okes, and are to be sold by Francis Eglesfield at his house in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Mary-gold,
notes: Editor's dedication signed "Io. Kirke". Variant: dedication signed "I.K.".
Reproduction of the original in the University of Michigan. Library.
